Polisi Tangkap Pria Cabuli Bocah di Toilet Tempat Ibadah Pekanbaru
01 Nov 2019, 13:23 by Chaidir Anwar Tanjung
Pekanbaru - Polresta Pekanbaru menangkap S (45) yang diduga melakukan pencabulan. Dia diduga mencabuli 7 bocah laki-laki.
"Kita sudah melakukan pemeriksaan terhadap tersangka Samsudin. Dari pemeriksaan, dia mengakui semua perbuatannya. Korbannya ada 7 anak bawah umur," kata Kasat Reskrim Polresta Pekanbaru, AKP Awaluddin Syam kepada detikcom, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Awaluddin mengatakan kasus dugaan pencabulan anak ini dilaporkan salah satu orang tua korban. Dia mengatakan orang tua salah satu korban mengatakan anaknya diajak tersangka pergi dengan sepeda motor pada Minggu (27/10).
"Setelah dibawa jalan-jalan tidak langsung pulang. Korban dibawa ke salah satu tempat ibadah. Di dalam toilet perbuatan cabul itu dilakukannya," kata Awaluddin.

Police Arrest Boy Cabuli Boy in Toilet of Pekanbaru Worship Place
01 Nov 2019, 13:23 by Chaidir Anwar Tanjung
Pekanbaru - Pekanbaru Police arrested S (45) for alleged sexual abuse. He allegedly molested 7 boys.
"We have conducted an examination of the suspect Samsudin. From the examination, he acknowledged all his actions. The victims were 7 underage children," Kasat Reskrim Pekanbaru Police, AKP Awaluddin Syam told AFP on Friday (1/11/2019).
Awaluddin said the alleged child molestation case was reported by one of the victims' parents. He said the parents of one of the victims said his son was invited by the suspect to go on a motorcycle on Sunday (10/27).
"After the streets were taken, they did not go straight home. The victim was taken to a place of worship. In the toilet, that obscene act was carried out," Awaluddin said.
